txt.en:
You freeze in place as a pain enters your chest. The cold stone conjures unbidden words to swell up in you. Unknowingly you say 'power' followed by 'Borangos,' and 'Narthalum.'

You close your eyes to cope with the pain and an image of an armoured Rogmul towers over you next to a vile statue. Your eyes shoot open as the images burn away.

Able to breathe again, you gather your thoughts. It seems the watching stone assumes you want to forge a treaty with Borangos and has shown you one of his lieutenants to speak to instead.
Statues can be found in Nargroth.\n\nYou should destroy statues to attract Narthalum's attention.
The watching stone is unmoving and silent.\n\nYou feel a sense of confusion and piercing eyes all around you.
Statues can be found in Nargroth.\n\nYou should destroy statues to attract Narthalum's attention.
'What creature dwells, unwelcomed in Nargroth? Have you a message for Borangos or are you simply pathetic and lost? I have not the time for this trifle!'
The Watching Stone unwillingly divulges more information about the structure of Borangos' forces in Nargroth. You can use this to your advantage.
Destroy a more prominent statue and defeat Narthalum
The Watching Stone can be found in Nargroth.\n\nYou should return to the Watching-stone.
